Rules.InvariantScript: If(Self.Layout = Layout.Horizontal, Min(280, Self.Width - 60), Min(280, Self.Height - 60))

"Code: "& LookUp(
    OfflineProductSKUCollection,
    'Product SKU' = ThisItem.'Product SKU'.'Product SKU'
).'Item Code'

ThisItem.Product.'Product Name' & " (" &LookUp(
    OfflineVariantCollection,
    Variants = LookUp(
        OfflineProductVariantCollection,
        'Product Variants' = ThisItem.'Product Variant'.'Product Variants'
    ).Variant.Variants
).'Variant Name' & ")"
If(IsBlank(LookUp('SKU Images', SKU.'Product SKU' = ThisItem.'Product SKU').'Image Link'), SampleImage, LookUp('SKU Images', SKU.'Product SKU' = ThisItem.'Product SKU').'Image Link')

LookUp(
    'Product Interesteds',
    Lead.Leads = varLeadData.Leads && 'Product SKU'.'Product SKU' = ThisItem.'Product SKU'
).Quantity

If(IsBlank(LookUp(
    OfflineProductPriceCollection,
    'Product SKU'.'Product SKU' = ThisItem.'Product SKU' && 'Price list'.Name = varPricelist.Name
).'Ex-Factory'), DisplayMode.Disabled, DisplayMode.Edit)

LookUp(
    'Product Interesteds',
    Lead.Leads = varLeadData.Leads && 'Product SKU'.'Product SKU' = ThisItem.'Product SKU'
).Discount

If(IsBlank(LookUp(
    OfflineProductPriceCollection,
    'Product SKU'.'Product SKU' = ThisItem.'Product SKU' && 'Price list'.Name = varPricelist.Name
).'Ex-Factory'), DisplayMode.Disabled, DisplayMode.Edit)

Sort(
    Filter(
        'Order Header.S',
        Lead.Leads = varLeadData.zx_leadsid && 'Quote / Order' = 'Quote Order Choice'.Order
    ),
    'Created On',
    SortOrder.Descending
)

"Quote No." & ThisItem.'Quote ID'
//"Order No." & ThisItem.'Order ID'

If(
    IsBlank(ThisItem.'Approval Status') || ThisItem.'Approval Status' = ApprovalChoiceQuoteHeader.Pending,
    true,
    false
)

//"Order To: " & ThisItem.'Bill To'.'Customer Name'
//"Order To: " & ThisItem.'Order To'.'Customer Name'

/*"Total Tax: " &""& LookUp(ThisItem.'Quote ID'=LookUp('Quote Lines','Quote Header'.'Quote ID'=ThisItem.'Quote ID').GST).*/
//"Total Tax: " &""& Sum(ThisItem.CGST,ThisItem.SGST,ThisItem.IGST)

//"Total Quote Amount: " &""&ThisItem.'Total Bill Amount (new_totalbillamount)'
"Total Quote Amount: " &""&ThisItem.'Total Price'

LookUp(
    Contacts_1,
    Party.'Customer Name' = varLeadData.Party.'Customer Name' && 'Primary Contact' = 'Primary Contact (Contacts_1)'.Yes
).'First Name'
